first_para: Daithí McKay, MLA (b. 1982, Ballymena, County Antrim, Northern Ireland) is an Irish republican politician. He is the Education spokesperson for Sinn Féin and the deputy chair of the Enterprise, Trade and Investment Committee in the Northern Irish Assembly. He is an MLA for North Antrim and was formerly a councillor on Ballymoney Borough Council.

full.extract: Daithí McKay, MLA (b. 1982, Ballymena, County Antrim, Northern Ireland) is an Irish republican politician. He is the Education spokesperson for Sinn Féin and the deputy chair of the Enterprise, Trade and Investment Committee in the Northern Irish Assembly. He is an MLA for North Antrim and was formerly a councillor on Ballymoney Borough Council.
full.title: Daithí McKay
